title: Internship Supervisor
descriptions: Guided, assisted, and provided hands-on training to a team of interns.
Conducted daily follow-ups with the team to track progress, address blockers, and provide feedback on deliverables.
Prepared a comprehensive product roadmap.
Performed multiple Pull Request reviews to ensure code quality and avoid any breaking change.
Developed features using Nuxt.js v3, Node.js, H3, Express.js, Nitro, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and TailwindCSS.

title: Full Stack Developer
descriptions: Advocated for the importance of automated testing across the team.
Took responsibility for frontend development and testing within the team.
Developed and maintained features using Vue.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Conducted and presented a benchmark of testing tools to determine the most suitable options for the team.
Implemented 5+ end-to-end (E2E) tests to validate functionality for new features using Playwright.
Developed component tests using vue/test-utils and Jest to enhance code reliability and maintainability.
Ensured informed decision-making by writing and presenting documents, including Architecture Decision Records (ADRs), to evaluate and choose technical solutions collaboratively.
Reduced human error by migrating Excel-based processes into intranet features for the marketing and content creation teams.
Automated intranet data updates using Stripe webhooks, ensuring up-to-date and accurate information.
Improved page consistency by standardizing layouts with Bootstrap-vue, Bootstrap, and CSS.

title: Vue.js 2 Trainer
descriptions: Delivered an intensive 3-day accelerated training on Vue.js 2 for individuals transitioning into IT.
Prepared tailored course material to align with the needs of beginners entering the IT field.
Guided participants through hands-on exercises to build practical experience with Vue.js 2 concepts.
Explained foundational Vue.js concepts such as components, directives, state management, and API integration.
Evaluated participants' progress and provided feedback for improvement.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
descriptions: Improved software maintainability, testability, and performance by migrating 10+ web components from AngularJS v1.8 to Vue.js v2.6.
Designed, developed, and tested new product features using Vue.js v2.6, Cypress v12, vue/test-utils, Jest, and .NET Framework v4.8.
Actively contributed to Scrum ceremonies, including sprint planning, reviews, and retrospectives, to support Agile workflows.
Performed 30+ detailed code reviews to ensure high-quality, maintainable, and efficient code.

title: Software Architect
descriptions: Researched and evaluated technical standards and tools for a project.
Tested tools, benchmarked them, and checked the feasibility of the solution.
Documented decisions and presented the results of each research weekly.

title: Senior Software Engineer
descriptions: Contributed to the product vision by bridging technical and business goals.
Served as the technical lead within the product team, providing expertise and guidance.
Proposed and presented technical solutions aligned with the product vision.
Designed a modular distributed system.
Documented technical decisions for team alignment and traceability.
Negotiated technical decisions with other teams to ensure cross-team collaboration.
Participated in innovation days.
Enhanced application performance, security, modularity, and testability.
Assisted with complex technical issues requiring system knowledge.
Developed Legal product features using Vue.js, Bootstrap-vue, .NET Core, .NET Framework, .NET Standard, Entity Framework, Entity Framework Core, SQL Server and JQuery.

title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Initiated the observability project with the software architect.
Analyzed and benchmarked 40+ observability tools, testing Azure Monitor, Splunk, ELK, and Graylog.
Authored articles, Wikis, and Guidelines on observability and architecture, including Evolutionary Architecture principles.
Presented the observability solution to the Engineering team and ensured implementation progress.
Transitioned ownership of the observability product to the DevOps team.
Developed features for an internal Techshare product using TDD, Vue.js, Vuetify, .NET Core, Asp.Net Core, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Docker, and Swagger.
Created a .NET CLI tool to scan projects, generate JSON reports, and integrated it into Azure pipelines.
Developed an API to process reports and insert data into SQL Server using Asp.NET Core and TDD.
Built actionable Power BI dashboards using M Query and DAX to provide solution metrics.
Collaborated with Engineering teams to use dashboard insights for improving solutions.
Developed a JAM Stack static website, 'Software Architecture Mantra,' using Vue.js, Vuetify, Azure Blob Storage, and Azure CDN.

title: Full Stack Developer
descriptions: Developed marketing strategies to promote products and services.
Delivered 20+ features through a user-friendly web application.
Managed and administered products/services using an intuitive administrator panel.
Provided company contact information for seamless communication and support.
Designed, developed, and tested two websites: https://tunpackmachinery.com and https://www.tunpackpaper.com.
Developed Tunpack Support, a mobile app with its administrator panel.

title: Full Stack Developer
descriptions: Collected, processed, and stored data from Excel sheets.
Generated financial forms and documents.
Maintained data consistency and integrity.
Compiled comprehensive sales statistics and historical data.
Restricted edit and delete access exclusively to the administrator.
Designed, developed, and maintained five versions of the product.

title: Software Engineer Internship
descriptions: Designed and implemented a scalable system enabling decentralized communication between services without central coordination.
Developed an email system capable of handling large volumes of messages while ensuring delivery and data integrity.
Defined and orchestrated process workflows, managed exceptions and errors, and ensured data consistency across distributed services.
